results.title: Evensong cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Gaumont British Picture Corporation and Victor Saville
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description:
Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye.
TEXT on the slide reads: Evelyn Laye in Evensong with Fritz Kortner Alice Delysia
The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736.
On the clear glass slide there are remnants of handwritten detail which has nearly all worn off. It possibly says: STARTS..

results.title: Emergency Call cinema slide
results.creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures and Edward Cahn
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Slide features imagery with a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Radio Pictures presents Bill Boyd with William Gargen Wynne Gibson in Emergency Call A spell-binding drama! Hurricane Speed! Heart-burning Romance! A Radio Picture Not suitable for General Exhibition

results.title: British Agent cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Warner Brothers First National Productions and Michael Curtiz
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description:
Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. Kay Francis Lesley Francis
It was said to be: “Too intimate to be printed!” “Too daring to be filmed!” British Agent Gunn Slide Not suitable for general exhibition On the front glass slide there is worn away hand writing: Monday matinee

results.title: A Bill of Divorcement cinema slide
results.creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures and George Cukor
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Slide imagery with a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: RKO Radio Pictures presents John Barrymore in A Bill of Divorcement A play that ran a solid year in London and New York with Katharine Hepburn Billie Bourk David Manners Barrymore in the biggest story and finest part of his brilliant career.

results.title: Who dares wins
results.creator_credit: Ian Sharp, Euan Lloyd and Sturia Leasing Ltd
results.brief_description: Judy Davis stars in a controversial role as the leader of an anti-nuclear terrorist group. They are planning to attack the American Embassy residence in London to draw attention to their cause. Lewis Collins, posing as a court martialled S.A.S. Captain joins the terrorists in their attack on the embassy and subsequent kidnapping. Once housed in the embassy, Collins commences a combined air and ground attack on the S.A.S. The lives of the hostages are at stake as the S.A.S begin their rescue operation. Also starring Edward Woodwood and based on an original story by George Markstein.

results.title: The Point
results.creator_credit: Nilsson House Music, Murakami-Wolf Productions, Jerry Good, Larry Gordon, Harry Nilsson and Fred Wolf
results.brief_description: Based on a fable by Harry Nilsson, this delightful family film is set in the land of Point. In Point, every object, including people, is moulded into a point. Into this world little Oblio is born; the first and only roundheaded child in the town. Oblio and his dog, Arrow, are punished for having no point and are banished to the Pointless Forest. It is not as lonely as they imagined for in the forest they meet several other creatures who have also been exiled because they were different. Join Oblio and Arrow as they discover that you don’t have to have a point to be accepted. Narrated by Ringo Starr and animated by director Fred Wolf.

results.title: Tales of terror
results.creator_credit: Roger Corman and Alta Vista Productions
results.brief_description: Presented on this tape are three classic tales from the master of mystery and imagination, Edgar Allan Poe, featuring Vincent Price, Peter Lorre and Basil Rathbone. MORELLA; A tormented spirit raises from the dead to seek revenge; THE BLACK CAT; A jealous husband is pursued by a black cat after he entombs his unfaithful wife and her lover; THE CASE OF M. VALDEMAR; A dying man and a crazed doctor become involved in an experiment to delay death. Also starring Debra Paget.

results.title: Something to hide
results.brief_description: Harry Field’s (Peter Finch) life is turned into a nightmare when he offers a hitch-hiker (Linda Hayden) a lift. His problems are exacerbated by marital problems and alcoholism. Also starring Shelley Winters, Colin Blakely, John Stride and Linda Hayden. Also known as “Shattered” and based on the book by Nicholas Monsarrat.

results.title: Pirates of Spring Cove
results.creator_credit: Richard Thorpe, Alan Brown and Duota Rentals
results.brief_description: Hayley Mills and John Mills star in this family pleaser that has adventure, piracy, buried treasure and romance. An American widower and his 18 year old daughter live on a Caribbean houseboat. When they invite the nephew of a millionaire to join them on their voyage, romance and action hop on board too. The nephew’s former business partner arrives and together they embark on a dive to discover buried treasure. James MacArthur (Hawaii Five-O) co stars. Also known as “The Truth about Spring”, after Hayley Mills’ character, Spring Tyler.

results.title: The Dead zone
results.creator_credit: David Cronenberg, Debra Hill, Rastar Productions and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: Faithfully adapted from the Stephen King novel of the same name, this is the chilling story of a man who wakes up from a five-year coma with the extraordinary power to see visions of the past, present and, most frightening, the future. A tense and thought provoking production in which Walken gives one of his most intense and believable performances.
